channel.title: Tempo of the Down
channel.itunes:author: Charssun
channel.itunes:subtitle: Podcasting downtempo to Earth
channel.itunes:summary: Tempo of the Down podcasts downtempo transmitted from the Voyager space explorer as it travels the universe on its mission of discovery...
channel.description: Tempo of the Down podcasts downtempo transmitted from the Voyager space explorer as it travels the universe on its mission of discovery...

item.title: Tempo of the Down: Session 05 [VoyagerRadio.com]
item.itunes:author: Charssun
item.itunes:subtitle: Pirates
item.itunes:summary: Session 05, the theme of which is "Pirates", features 13 songs by the best downtempo artists in the universe, and copyright discussion by Prof. Lawrence Lessig.
item.description: The Session 05 playlist is as follows: 01. Timbo - Zero Hour - Slow Progress [myspace.com/timbo2] | 02. Chill Factor 5 - Truth - Premiere [electronfarm.net] | 03. Solus - Ummes - Lights In The Valley [upstairsrecordings.com] | 04. Solus - Session 5 - Lights In The Valley [upstairsrecordings.com] | 05. Mossyrock - Whiskey is the Devil - The Zero to One Sessions [nicesmooth.com] | 06. Mossyrock - Lips That Hurt [nicesmooth.com] | 07. Canartic - One Drop - Headphone Test [dankdisk.com] | 08. Kinder Atom - Cabride - Mmm Mmm Mmm Mmm Mmm [nicesmooth.com] | 09. Kinder Atom - Willie Pierce - Mmm Mmm Mmm Mmm Mmm [nicesmooth.com] | 10. Molasses - Curiosity - Madness [E.P.] [ ubiquityrecords.com] | 11. Aphex Twin - Fingerbib - The Richard D. James Album [warprecords.com] | 12. Quant - Get Off My Line - Getting Out [laxrecordings.com] | 13. Under the Radar - Red Eye Back - Radio Flyer [richardsouther.com] | Including Professor Lawrence Lessig and Jeff Tweedy's discussion of modern copyright practices.

item.title: Tempo of the Down: Session 04.5 [VoyagerRadio.com]
item.itunes:author: Charssun
item.itunes:subtitle: Katrina
item.itunes:summary: Session 04.5 is a shortened edition of Tempo of the Down intended to assist with the Hurricane relief effort. 1-800-HELP-NOW
item.description: Session 04.5 is a shortened edition of Tempo of the Down intended to asssit with the Hurricane relief effort. 1-800-HELP-NOW

item.title: Tempo of the Down: Session 04 [VoyagerRadio.com]
item.itunes:author: Charssun
item.itunes:subtitle: Transmission
item.itunes:summary: Session 04 presents the latest downtempo by a variety of independent artists.
item.description: Session 04 presents the latest downtempo by a variety of independent artists.

item.title: Tempo of the Down: Session 03.5 [VoyagerRadio.com]
item.itunes:author: Charssun
item.itunes:subtitle: Extended
item.itunes:summary: Session 03.5 is an extra edition of Tempo of the Down, and includes commentary by President Roosevelt.
item.description: The Session 03.5 playlist is as follows: 01. Baby Grand - Summer - Club Grand [clubgrand.co.uk] | 02. Flunk - Morning Star - Morning Star [kriztal.com] | (still editing all this)
